title: What's new in version 1.7.0
text:
Very big update incoming!
* Lock Screen Widgets for your top mining rigs! (iOS 16 required)
* Neoxa support for Minerpool, 2Miners and Herominers
 * Ravencoin support for Hiveon Pool
* Fixing an issue with Herominer's Flux reward estimation being too big
* Improving 2Miners reward estimations

Thanks for everyone that sent a bug report or a feature request! I'm working on all of your requests!

title: Please, rate this app!
text: If you're feeling generous with your time, please support me by leaving a nice review in the App Store. As an independent developer, it means the world to me. Thank you!
